item.title: HA
item.description: HAProxy https://www.haproxy.com/ 安装: $ sudo apt-get install haproxy 配置: $ sudo vim /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg global: log /dev/log local0 log /dev/log local1 notice chroot /var/lib/haproxy stats socket /run/haproxy/admin.sock mode 660 level admin expose-fd listeners stats timeout 30s user haproxy group haproxy daemon # Default SSL material locations ca-base /etc/ssl/certs crt-base /etc/ssl/private # Default ciphers to use on SSL-enabled listening sockets. # For more information, see ciphers(1SSL). This list
